title: Ikuo Towhata
text: is a <a href="geotechnic">geotechnic</a>al <a href="engineering">engineering</a> <a href="professor">professor</a> at the <a href="University%20of%20Tokyo">University of Tokyo</a>, <a href="Japan">Japan</a>. Currently, he is the chief <a href="editor%20in%20chief">editor</a> of "Soils and Foundations," a <a href="civil%20engineering">civil engineering</a> <a href="Academic%20journal">journal</a>. His research work is mainly in the areas of <a href="liquefaction">liquefaction</a> of <a href="soil">soil</a> during <a href="earthquake">earthquake</a>s.
